title: Equity To Ballot Members Over Digital Scanning & Artificial Intelligence
description: Equity is to ballot members over digital scanning and artifical intelligence in a move that takes on Pact, the producer trade body.
content:
EXCLUSIVE: Thousands of UK actors could refuse to be digitally scanned on set as the Equity union makes history by holding a ballot of its members from the film and TV industry.

title: IBM CEO Arvind Krishna explains why tech layoffs have increased
description: IBM CEO Arvind Krishna states that tech layoffs are mainly due to pandemic over-hiring and not directly because of artificial intelligence. He explains how the job market is adjusting and shares his views on the future impact of AI on employment.
content: IBM CEO Arvind Krishna said in an interview with The Verge that the current wave of layoffs in the tech industry is not mainly because of artificial intelligence. Instead, he pointed to over-hiring during the pandemic as the key factor, calling the r... [3028 chars]

title: Palantir teams with Nvidia, CenterPoint Energy for software to speed up AI data center construction
description: Palantir Technologies , Nvidia and U.S. utility CenterPoint Energy on Thursday said they are developing a new software platform to accelerate the building of new artificial intelligence data centers.
content: The new software system will be called Chain Reaction. It will seek to help firms that are building AI data centers, which can consume as much electricity as a small city, with permitting, supply chain and construction challenges. Executives involved... [1120 chars]
